examples: He asked for her hand in marriage.
Did your friend ask for permission to use the image?
Leaving your valuables in plain sight in your car is asking for a break-in.
They will be asking for it.
They asked for his last name at the hotel check-in, to confirm his reservation.
words.defineEn: to state that one wants to see or speak to someone specific
words.defineVi: để nói rằng một người muốn xem hoặc nói chuyện với ai đó cụ thể

examples: I'm not surprised the bully backed down when you confronted him.

They might back down.
- I'm not backing down.
President Macron didn't back down.
words.defineEn: to admit that one has lost; to withdraw a demand, claim, etc. when facing opposition

words.defineEn: to think that a method, idea, etc. is right, acceptable, or effective
words.defineVi: để nghĩ rằng một phương pháp, ý tưởng, vv là đúng, chấp nhận được, hoặc hiệu quả

words.defineEn: to cause something to happen, particularly an unpleasant one
words.defineVi: để gây ra một cái gì đó xảy ra, đặc biệt là một khó chịu

examples: You definitely struck a sour note when you brought up Dan's ex-girlfriends during your best man speech.
Like Castle, Wilson had been brought up in a similar way, and they spoke the same language.
I thought about bringing up my concerns but decided instead to let sleeping dogs lie.
We all sat sipping our tea quietly, no one wanting to bring up the white elephant in the room about Joel's expulsion from college.
And if I ever felt tempted to bring up the situation, I zipped my lips before any words emerged.
words.defineEn: to raise a subject so that it can be talked about
words.defineVi: để nâng cao một chủ đề để nó có thể được nói về

examples: Trump calls off the dogs in response.
Management urged cabin crew to call off their work to rule.
There was an eleventh-hour decision by the union to call off the strike.
Staff had been calling off because they were sick.
The study was supposed to last for 2 weeks but was actually called off after just 6 days because the conditions in the prison went downhill so quickly.
words.defineEn: to cancel what has been planned
words.defineVi: để hủy bỏ những gì đã được lên kế hoạch

examples: The tech company's innovative new product is so far ahead of the curve that competitors will struggle to catch up.

You're all caught up.

words.defineEn: to go faster and reach someone who is ahead
words.defineVi: để đi nhanh hơn và đạt được một người phía trước

examples: In fact, if you have a room with infinitely many kids but not infinitely many cookies, if you share the cookies evenly each kid will only get an infinitesimally small crumb, and none of them will be cheered up.
words.defineEn: to feel happier
words.defineVi: để cảm thấy hạnh phúc hơn

words.defineEn: to make oneself neat or clean
words.defineVi: để làm cho mình gọn gàng hoặc sạch sẽ

examples: I came across a recipe that uses quark as a base for homemade ice cream.
We recently came across a wall, before that it was all going very smoothly.
As we walked through the cornfield, we came across a cob that had fallen from one of the stalks.
He looked through her belongings in the hope of coming across some information.
He looked through her belongings in the hope of coming across some information.
words.defineEn: to discover, meet, or find someone or something by accident
words.defineVi: để khám phá, đáp ứng, hoặc tìm một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó một cách tình cờ

examples: The issue comes up over and over on the stump.

words.defineEn: (of a subject, situation, etc.) to be mentioned
words.defineVi: (của một chủ đề, tình huống, vv) được đề cập

words.defineEn: to resolve a difficulty, carry out a task, etc.
words.defineVi: để giải quyết một khó khăn, thực hiện một nhiệm vụ, vv

examples: I just dropped by to see how you were getting on.

words.defineVi: để thực hiện một chuyến thăm không chính thức đến một ai đó hoặc một nơi nào đó

examples: The average millennial eats out 5 times a week!

words.defineVi: ăn trong một nhà hàng, vv hơn là ở nhà của một người

examples: Previously estate agents ended up as a monkey in the middle between landlord and tenant.

examples: Poor Jane really fell apart at the seams during the funeral service.

words.defineVi: rơi hoặc vỡ thành từng mảnh do ở trong tình trạng cực kỳ tồi tệ

examples: We need to figure out a way to fix this broken thing.

She couldn't figure out how to use the software for the life of her.

examples: The passport application requires you to fill in your first name, middle name, and last name.

examples: We used to argue a lot when we were younger, but my sister and I get along much better now.

words.defineVi: dành nhiều thời gian ở một nơi cụ thể hoặc với một ai đó cụ thể

examples: It seeks to leave out the mumbo jumbo about the terms of the agreement.

just make out that application for the Air Force Reserve.

examples: The library stands as a testament to the wisdom of generations of teachers who have passed away, reminding us that teachers die but books live on to inspire future learners.

Mark's friend had passed away, and he found that all things grow with time except grief, as he slowly learned to cope with the loss and cherish the memories they shared.
After my grandfather passed away, our family gathered together to share memories and support each other, proving how company in distress makes trouble less.
words.defineEn: to die, used when one does not want to use the word ‘die’
words.defineVi: chết, được sử dụng khi người ta không muốn sử dụng từ 'chết'

examples: Remember, never put off until tomorrow what you can do today!

words.defineVi: để trì hoãn hoặc hủy bỏ một cái gì đó như một cuộc hẹn hoặc sắp xếp

examples: Patrick Henry had seen to it that Madison wasn't in the Senate of the United States.

examples: I was put in charge of the office.

examples: The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.

words.defineVi: để loại bỏ hoàn toàn hoặc loại bỏ
